para.text: For the purposes of subchapter XX-E of Chapter 6 of Title 1, the term:
"Marijuana" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 48-901.02(3)(A).
"Undue hardship" shall have the same meaning as provided in section 101(10) of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990, approved July 26, 1990 (104 Stat. 330; 42 U.S.C. § 12111(10)).

annotations.annotation: as added Apr. 27, 2021, D.C. Law 23-276, § 2(e), 68 DCR 48
